DOC.brief_summary: Fibromyalgia common cause widespread musculoskeletal pain . The investigator find patient seem benefit soft tissue physical therapy call neurostructural integration therapy ( NST ) . The purpose study compare NST hydrotherapy already use manage fibromyalgia symptom .
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty female patient meet American College Rheumatology diagnostic criterion classification FM enrol study . Patients randomly allocate receive either hydrotherapy NST . Patient evaluation perform baseline , six week , three month , six month . Primary outcome measure include SF-36 quality life questionnaire , Fibromyalgia Impact Questionnaire Total Myalgic Score . Duration morning stiffness duration weekly aerobic exercise report participant secondary outcome measure . Statistics analysis perform standard parametric non parametric method .
DOC.criteria: Any patient fulfills ACR diagnostic criterion fibromyalgia Patients establish ischemic heart disease , uncontrolled hypertension diabetes , hypothyroidism , severe depression
